txt_en: Love is eternal.
Make peace with life.
I will always think of you.
Time heals all wounds.
Take charge of your own life.
We're not quitters.
We're meant to be together.
Life is all about perseverance.
I shall turn out to be the hero of my own life.
People living deeply have no fear of death.
You can't compare yourself to other people. You'll do it your way.
txt_cn: 不必和他人比较，你有自己的人生节奏。

txt_en: Journeys end in lovers meeting.
txt_cn: 遇见对的人，从此便不再漂泊无依。

txt_en: I love you for who you are, not who the world wants you to be.
txt_cn: 我爱你，只因为是你，与世界对你的期待无关。

txt_en: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is to love.
txt_cn: 学会去爱，是人生最有意义的事情。

txt_en: Life is a gift.
We are soulmates tied together by the beautiful threads of fate.
txt_cn: 我们是命中注定的灵魂伴侣。

txt_en: We all have to deal with mountains.
txt_cn: 每个人都有自己需要越过的高山。

txt_en: Live your best life.
I love you and I always will.
Love is a journey.
From the moment we met, I felt there was something special between us.
txt_cn: 相遇的那一刻，我们在冥冥之中便有了羁绊。

txt_en: I'll never forget that beautiful summer's day.
txt_cn: 我永远不会忘记那美丽的夏日。

txt_en: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
txt_cn: 保持动力与坚持可以战胜一切。

txt_en: Love is the strongest thing in the world.
txt_cn: 爱是世界上最强大的存在。

txt_en: You've gotta make your own magic.
There's always a way to turn things around.
Affection is desirable.
You are what I believe in.
To make each day count.
There is always something you can do, and succeed at.
txt_cn: 每个人都有自己的成功之路。
